series_description: This series consists of monthly, quarterly, and annual workpapers used in the preparation of the financial statements for Virginia Housing Development Authority (VHDA). This series may include, but is not limited to: Crystal reports, system reports of various departments, and other financial statement support documentation.
retention_statement: Retain 5 years after the end of the fiscal year then destroy.

series_description: This series documents the purchase, depreciation, disposal, and reconciliation of fixed assets.
retention_statement: Retain 3 years after completion of audit then destroy.

series_description: This series consists of workpapers and backups that pertain to specific monthly and quarterly account reconciliations. This series may include, but is not limited to: system reports, trial balances, and Excel spreadsheets.
retention_statement: Retain 3 years after completion of audit year then destroy.

series_description: This series consists of documentation supporting the work processes of the Investment department. This series may include, but is not limited to: daily worksheets, Ullman rebate calculations, investment reports, wire request forms, and Multi-family (MUT) letters.
retention_statement: Retain 7 years after the final maturity of bond or last call of bond, whichever is later, then destroy in compliance with No. 8 on schedule cover page.

series_title: Legal Partnerships and Other Entities This series consist of monthly, quarterly, and annual workpapers for legal entities and partnerships of VHDA. This series may include, but is not limited to: Crystal reports and tax returns.
retention_statement: Retain 3 years after dissolution of entity then destroy in compliance with No. 8 on schedule cover page.
